verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> that came to Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> against the Philistines <WH6430>, before that Pharaoh <WH6547> smote <WH5221> Gaza <WH5804>. Gaza: Heb. Azzah

Thus saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068>; Behold, waters <WH4325> rise up <WH5927> out of the north <WH6828>, and shall be an overflowing <WH7857> flood <WH5158>, and shall overflow <WH7857> the land <WH776>, and all that is therein <WH4393>; the city <WH5892>, and them that dwell <WH3427> therein: then the men <WH120> shall cry <WH2199>, and all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> shall howl <WH3213>. all that: Heb. the fulness thereof

At the noise <WH6963> of the stamping <WH8161> of the hoofs <WH6541> of his strong <WH47> horses, at the rushing <WH7494> of his chariots <WH7393>, and at the rumbling <WH1995> of his wheels <WH1534>, the fathers <WH1> shall not look back <WH6437> to their children <WH1121> for feebleness <WH7510> of hands <WH3027>;

Because of the day <WH3117> that cometh <WH935> to spoil <WH7703> all the Philistines <WH6430>, and to cut off <WH3772> from Tyrus <WH6865> and Zidon <WH6721> every helper <WH5826> that remaineth <WH8300>: for the LORD <WH3068> will spoil <WH7703> the Philistines <WH6430>, the remnant <WH7611> of the country <WH339> of Caphtor <WH3731>. the country: Heb. the isle
Baldness <WH7144> is come <WH935> upon Gaza <WH5804>; Ashkelon <WH831> is cut off <WH1820> with the remnant <WH7611> of their valley <WH6010>: how long wilt thou cut <WH1413> thyself?

O <WH1945> thou sword <WH2719> of the LORD <WH3068>, how long will it be ere <WH3808> thou be quiet <WH8252>? put up <WH622> thyself into thy scabbard <WH8593>, rest <WH7280>, and be still <WH1826>. put: Heb. gather thyself

How can it be quiet <WH8252>, seeing the LORD <WH3068> hath given it a charge <WH6680> against Ashkelon <WH831>, and against the sea <WH3220> shore <WH2348>? there hath he appointed <WH3259> it. How: Heb. How canst thou
